com.github.dandelion.core.asset

Class AssetQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.asset.AssetQuery

  • public class AssetQuery
extends Object

    Builder that allows to create and execute queries in order to retrieve all Asset to be loaded for the current HttpServletRequest.

    If caching is enabled, the result of the query is cached in the configured RequestCache system to be returned faster.

    Since:
    0.9.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

    • Constructor Detail

        public AssetQuery(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,

    • Method Detail

      • atPosition

        public AssetQuery atPosition(AssetDomPosition assetDomPosition)

        Filters the desired Assets on their AssetDomPosition.

        If no DOM position is provided, all assets required in the current page will be returned.

        Parameters:
        assetDomPosition - the DOM position used to filter.
        Returns:
        the current instance of AssetQuery.

      • perform

        public Set<Asset> perform()

        Actually performs the query to retrieve the desired Assets.

        Returns:
        an ordered set of Asset to be used in the current HttpServletRequest.

      • alerts

        public Set<Alert> alerts()
